game_description: Hyper Dash is a free VR multiplayer team based shooter. GAME MODES Payload, Domination, Control Point, (Team) Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Elimination, Ball and remix them with Mutators! MOVEMENT Dash, sprint, and rail grind your way across the arenas to engage the enemy in fast-paced combat and secure the objective for your team. FEATURES Offline mode/Bots, Dedicated servers, Private servers, Rebind-able controls, Left hand support, Voice chat. CROSS-BUY Buy for Rift or Quest and get the other free.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Dutch, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain)
review_1: Fortnite battle pass I just s*** out my a** Booted up my PC, 'cause I need, need To get that Fortnite battle pass I like Fortnite, did I mention Fortnite? I like Fortnite, it's night time I mean it's five o' clock, that's basically night time Y'all remember Cartoon Network, adventure time?
review_2: The game is a amazing shooter I play it every time I play on my oculus the chat and the games are epic even the sounds tbh I thought it was a game you download once and never play again but I was so shocked the game modes are so hooking and makes me want to play forever my favorite game mode is the chapter the flag it is so well made
review_3: Alright. I like this. This game is fun. It seems like a good mix of parkour elements and Multiplayer FPS. I think the mode for me is the one that’s the free for all. I don’t know the names of gamemodes. I kinda just started playing an hour or like thirty minutes ago. But I recommend this game for people who, like myself, need to get good. Competition isn’t that bad. (From what I’ve seen.) Five stars, hands down.
review_4: Since day one that I started playing haven't stopped, I played everyday but since about a week ago I haven't been able to play it doesn't load it just stays blank I tried everything and nothing has worked so far so I ask if someone else has the same problem or if the developer can do something about it Truly yours : Bujing
review_5: I like to get smgs and mow enemies. My top pub kill count was 511 kills to 4 deaths…that’s a KD of 128! Can you top it? Kd is 7.02, but there’s one guy with a 19.2 and another with a 35.4…but I play a mix of matches, like pro matches, regular old pubs, such and such…which is where I obtained a mix of skill sets appropriate for different games. If you are super good and find yourself in a pub, yes it feels good to get 300+ kills a match but after 20-30 matches like that you crave a challenge. Take it from me - I’ve been there.
